title.value: Прогнозирование вероятности банкротства сельскохозяйственного предприятия на основе дискриминантных многофакторных моделей
Agricultural enterprise bankruptcy probability forecasting on the basis of discriminantal multifactorial models
Agricultural enterprise bankruptcy probability forecasting on the basis of discriminantal multifactorial models

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shcherbatyuk, S.Yu., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was diagnosed bankruptcy probability of agricultural enterprises on the basis of a ratio analysis and discriminant models. On the UO 'Putrishki' have been tested models of national and foreign authors such as: G.V.Savitskaya, Altman, Taffler and Tishaw, W.Beaver, M.A.Fedotova, R.S.Sajfulin and G.G.Kadykov, Olga Zaitseva. Also has been applied and supplemented by formal bankruptcy probability estimation developed by the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Belarus. The most effective method of predicting bankruptcy probability was developed by G.V.Savitskaya, as it considers factors of an agricultural production and national features of formation and use of the enterprise capital. Results of diagnostics on G.V.Savitskoj's model coincide with the forecast by an official technique of the Belarus enterprises solvency estimation. A line of models (by foreign and Russian authors) does not allow to give exact definition of the enterprise financial situation
